sub_title: Assistant office manager / Lead executive bij UCC-Services
summary: I am a proactive, well presented, approachable individual who has successful experience within business marketing, sales, tourism and hospitality in addition to office management. I possess excellent interpersonal skills and can effectively liaise and network with clientele to achieve positive outcomes. I am able to effectively manage workloads to ensure all targets are reached, beyond the level of required satisfaction.  I am reliable and committed to my work and I strive to continue to succeed in today’s market. I can use my initiative and think on my feet to resolve problematic issues within the workplace as well as transfer my existing skill set, where relevant to a role. I am friendly and can work well with other staff members but also have the ability to work independently. I am always looking to push myself within a role and learn new that will further my opportunities.

profile_positions.description: Giving support in a dual role to the managing director to ensure the smooth running of the company as well as being the main source of marketing and generating clientele/business. Duties included, liaising and networking effectively with reputable companies to maintain relationships, creating marketing and sales strategies, sourcing effective employees and providing appropriate training, ensuring all invoices are correctly stored for the accountant,  contacting potential clientele and generating business deals, writing up contracts, dealing with suppliers, in addition to general daily admin work. In my role as operational manager it is my responsibility to ensure that all works are carried out to the company’s standards by the effective management of employees across 4 commercial sites. Duties include but are not limited to spot checking areas, preparing rotas; organising holiday and sickness cover, ensuring stock levels are maintained, holding review and performance meetings with clients and employees alike, in addition to some hands on work when needed. The sites I manage include British Airways executive lounge (Schiphol airport), Servisair executive lounge (Schiphol airport), Singapore airline executive lounge (Schiphol airport) and a large volume of offices situated in the vicinity of Hoofddorp
profile_positions.title: Assistant office manager / Lead executive

profile_positions.description:
The role was being a hostess/ hotel ambassador within the hotel situated within the confines of the airport and required a security screening. Duties required a ‘hands on’ approach and included providing excellent customer service to guests; ensuring all needs were catered for, handling enquiries, providing a porter/room service, checking guests in and out of rooms, spot checking rooms to ensure that the required standard of cleanliness is being maintained by the housekeeping staff, recording damages and sourcing repairs in 
addition to stock taking and replenishment. The role strengthened my experience and capability within the tourism sectors, giving me vital experience in face to face customer service.
profile_positions.title: Host

profile_positions.description:
The role included being a supervisor for a small team of staff. Duties included overseeing the staff rotas, finding and providing cover should it be required, stock taking and replenishment, event management, overseeing the team’s daily duties to ensure the smooth running of the bar. 
I feel the role enabled me to effectively work with a group of people to ensure results were achieved. I was able to demonstrate my networking and liaising skills as well as being given the opportunity to plan events which in turn heightened revenue. This role has given me the confidence to lead a team and manage my time effectively.
profile_positions.title: Bar supervisor

profile_positions.description:
This role enabled me to establish a sense of responsibility within the work place. I was responsible for the upkeep of two large office complexes by running a small team. Duties 
included preparing timesheets, stock take and replenishment, spot checking employee’s daily tasks were arrived out to the required standard, arranging cover for sickness and holidays as well as ensuring buildings were safe and secure. The role gave me practical knowledge into the planning and operations of running a housekeeping business.
profile_positions.title: Assistant manager

volunteer_experiences.description: Annual walk of the 13 bridges of London. Fundraising to support the charities work and to raise awareness of Prostate cancer.
